Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Loyola. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Loyola.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Indiana
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Indiana due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Indiana due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
